name: Aim Trainer (Kelvination)
description:
Aim Trainer (creative name, I know) is the first game that I added a UI and an actual scoring system. There were a couple unexpected challenges in this project that I had to overcome, which made it a lot more gratifying to complete. For instance, creating a sphere of targets seemed like it would be pretty easy but I ended up having to do a lot of research into different methods of creating an evenly spaced sphere of points. I also struggled to create the arrows the guide you to the next target, since there could be targets above, below, in front, or behind you at any point.

If I were to go back and change anything about this game, I would add more options for generating the sphere, such as size, distance, density, and maybe even generating only a portion of the sphere so that you don't have to constantly look behind you or directly up or down.
